data.name: Graviton
data.description: Graviton is an A.I.M. Controller who extends negative status effects on enemies.

starItems.name: Graviton
starItems.description: Graviton is an A.I.M. Controller who extends negative status effects on enemies.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per negative effect on the target.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per negative effect on the target.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>50%</color> damage per negative effect on the target.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to secondary attacks

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage per negative effect on the target.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage per negative effect on the target.

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>75%</color> damage per negative effect on the target.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary attack
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to secondary attacks

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + Bonus attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage per negative effect on the target.

1.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage. Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

If Scientist Supreme is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage. Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

If Scientist Supreme is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

3.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage. Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

If Scientist Supreme is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

If Scientist Supreme is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

5.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Apply +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

If Scientist Supreme is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

6.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage. Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

If Scientist Supreme is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.
6.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

7.description:
Attack primary target and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Apply +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Slow</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

If Scientist Supreme is an ally, apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary target and adjacent targets.

1.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage per negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

2.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>125%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage per negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

3.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>50%</color> additional damage per negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> additional damage per negative effect

4.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> additional damage per negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

5.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>225%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>75%</color> additional damage per negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> additional damage per negative effect

6.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> additional damage per negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

7.description: Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + <color=#86e619>100%</color> additional damage per negative effect + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

1.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>25%</color>

2.description:
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>

3.description:
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, increase the duration of their negative effects by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

4.description:
When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, increase the duration of their negative effects by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568><color=#fff568>WAR</color></color>, on Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

5.description:
When an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> health, increase the duration of their negative effects by +<color=#86e619>1</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>A.I.M.</color> <color=#fff568>MINION</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.

In <color=#fff568><color=#fff568>WAR</color></color>, on Turn, reduce Speed Bar of the enemy with the highest Speed by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, when an enemy drops below <color=#86e619>75%</color> health, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.
